PH::make_coin(C,PH).
coin(C) :- make_coin(C,0.8).
coins_r(SC,SC,0).
coins_r(SC,S,CNT) :-
 CNT > 0,
 
coin(CNT),
    (coin(CNT) -> NewSC is SC + 1 ; NewSC is SC),
    NewCNT is CNT - 1,
    coins_r(NewSC,S,NewCNT).
total(S) :- coins_r(0,S,4).
query(total(_)).
